General.Name: Canopy Holdings AS
General.Description: Canopy Holdings AS operates as a technology company in Norway and internationally. The company engages in development and sale of technology, software, and apps for resorts, destinations, parks, and other attractions. Canopy Holdings AS was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

7.Name: Mr. Matt  Cohen
7.Title: Interim Chief Exec. Officer of Catalate
